about_the_game:
The Digital Extras of ELEX contain a PDF artbook, a soundtrack compilation as wav and a Making of video.

The artbook features more than 50 pages of beautiful art used to create all parts of ELEX – the world, the creatures, the weapons, the characters and the overall mood. With this you will get a behind the scenes look on how games shape up.

The soundtrack features 22 atmospheric tracks by Björn Pankratz in wav format. Enjoy the music of ELEX now on your favorite music player.
The Making Of video features 30 minutes of interviews and behind the scenes footage on how the game was created.

name: ELEX Digital Extras

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3570, AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB, AMD Radeon 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790, AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 3GB, AMD RX 480 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound card
